Maya Benari
About Contact

I’m a designer who’s passionate about usable and accessible design, building design systems, and growing a culture of inclusive design.

Work

  • U.S. Web Design System

    Making it easy for government agencies to build fast and accessible websites through a design system.

     design systems front-end development

  • SimpleReport

    Developing a fast and easy way for COVID-19 test facilities to report results to public health departments.

     UX design component library

  • Accessibility for Teams

    Launching a role-based accessibility guide to get people into the practice of accessibility.

     product lead

  • Vote.gov

    Streamlining voting information to help folks find a trusted source to register to vote.

     front-end design
